<EnumerationListItem name="DebugDirectivesOnly">

</EnumerationListItem>

<EnumerationListItem name="DebugLineTablesOnly">
Emit only debug info necessary for generating line number tables (-gline-tables-only)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a53c8523a6f1da6d46597d57e212f2d6aa3b01b0bb8f8defb1ca19687e7f5f7789" />
<EnumerationListItem name="DebugInfoConstructor">
Limit generated debug info for classes to reduce size
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a53c8523a6f1da6d46597d57e212f2d6aa618351bacb827e6a919e8be550cc319a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LimitedDebugInfo">
Limit generated debug info to reduce size (-fno-standalone-debug)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a53c8523a6f1da6d46597d57e212f2d6aa6836cdc835f0b87af75c226a2f175ab7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FullDebugInfo">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a53c8523a6f1da6d46597d57e212f2d6aa0e3504dab6615356f73ce8fdc5db0ede" />
<EnumerationListItem name="UnusedTypeInfo">
Generate debug info for types that may be unused in the source (-fno-eliminate-unused-debug-types)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>
